com.layers.app.business

Class ScaleBusinessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.layers.app.business.ScaleBusinessService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScaleBusinessInterface

    public class ScaleBusinessService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScaleBusinessInterface
    Scale business service handles scale related requests that involve assembling data, modifying liquor and scale configurations, and removing scales based on the location or business that is implementing the request. This also invludes an API request `saveScaleLog` that processes the data POST'ed from the Arduino.

    Business services serve has a facade to requesters, concealing the processes while enforcing business logic via checked exception rules and verify the request has been processed appropriately. Business services partition data access logic responsibilities to the respective data access object or other services to assemble the data.

    -- example of business logic exception:

     
 Object object = serviceDAO.findObject();
 if(object == null) 
 {
        throw new ObjectNotFoundException();
 }
    See Also:
    UserDataInterface
